name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Put the Butter in a pot and stir over medium heat
Once the milkfats just start browning, pour into a cup/bowl
Refrigerate Butter for an hour until hard and cold
Chop Walnuts and put in a pan over medium heat to briefly toast
Allow Walnuts cool to room temperature (about an hour)
Whisk together Flour, Fine Salt, Baking Soda, and Cinnamon
Put cold browned Butter in a stand mixer
Mix with Sugar and Brown Sugar until consistent
Crack in the Eggs and mix until consistent
Over mixing from here on makes the cookies tough, so be quick
Add in half the dry mixture, mix just until consistent
Add in second half and only mix until it comes together
Mix in toasted Walnuts, Rice Crispies, and Oats
Cover tight and refrigerate over night (12-24 hours)
Break balls in half, squish sides back together so top is textured
Place balls crackley-side-up and bake for 12 minutes
Put cookies on a cooling rack
